Package main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationController
    Controller class for the configuration of the current UI.
    ConfigurationIO
    Reads/Writes a GlobalConfigurationWrapper from/to a file using jackson ObjectMapper.
    ConfigurationWizard
    UI used to configure the system by allocating UI properties to existing device properties in Micro-manager, the values of their state if applicable and the values of the UI parameters.
    GlobalConfiguration
    Class holding the list of known PluginConfigurations and the name of the currently loaded configuration.
    GlobalConfigurationWrapper
    Wraps a GlobalConfiguration in a simple class in order to write and read the class using jackson ObjectMapper.
    PluginConfiguration
    Class representing a plugin configuration.
